casebody.data:
Buchanan vs. Willingham. WARNER, Chief Justice.

An affidavit of illegality filed by a widow upon the ground that .the execution was levied on property which had been set apart as a homestead to her deceased husband, was not demurrable because it failed to state that the plaintiff in fi.fa. had not filed an affidavit that his claim was within some one of the exceptions to the homestead act.
